Description: Green glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the body is inscribed with six rows of black painted Hieratic script; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
